name: Thief
description: You lash out with a quick attack that may steal a creature’s held item. Make a melee attack against a creature, doing 1d10 + MOVE dark damage on a hit. If the user does not have an item held, the target must make a DEX save against your Move DC or have their item stolen by the user.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Shows off the Pokemon’s appeal about as well as the move used just before it.
